title: Sustainable fermentable sugar production using glass fiber supported gallium-molybdenum photocatalyst towards bioethanol: LCA analysis†
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00226A, Paper

For the first time, a cost-effective glass fiber (GF) support derived from wasted printed circuit boards (W-PCB) was utilized to synthesize a reusable GF-supported gallium-molybdenum photocatalyst (GaMo-GF) for generating fermentable...
